tldr: Affected versions of this package are affected by a race condition found in both the new and legacy `JetStream APIs`. This issue specifically arises in the Fetch APIs that return MessageBatch, where a race condition can occur when accessing errors. An attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to carry out a Denial-of-Service (DoS) attack.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `nats` library to the patch version.
